links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,1).
formula: Contribution from Bruno Berselli, Dec 02 2010: (Start)G.f.:  x*(2+x+2*x^2)/(1-x^5); a(n) = a(n-5) for n>4.a(n) = ((n mod 5)+5*(n+1 mod 5)-(n+2 mod 5)+3*(n+3 mod 5)-3*(n+4 mod 5))/10 (see Paolo P. Lava in A070341). (End)
author: Stuart M. Ellerstein (ellerstein(AT)aol.com), Mar 27 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 08 2000
